comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: General Rudolf Ritter von Brudermann, not to be confused with his general father or his two general brothers: www.austro-hungarian-army.co.uk/biog/rbruder.htm

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: rjones:  Thanks for providing us with Brudermann's full name.  We'll include it next time we update the description.
